definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
see 求全責備|求全责备[qiu2 quan2 ze2 bei4]

sentences.english: Forensic dean blames administrative front courtyard to ought not to not see object tousle subpoena.
sentences.chinese: 法院院長責備行政庭不該不看對象亂髮傳票。

sentences.english: Don't blame me for the delay.
He suffered no man to do them wrong: yea, he reproved kings for their sakes.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華不容什麼人欺負他們，爲他們的緣故責備君王。

sentences.english: Although De Gang can blame the sea aloud, but he is same however ashamed is right Chun Yan.
sentences.chinese: 儘管德綱可以大聲責備大海，但他卻一樣愧對春顏。

sentences.english: His mother railed at him for his haughtiness.
sentences.chinese: 他的母親由於他的驕傲自大而責備他。

sentences.english: We definitely do not blame vaccines.
sentences.chinese: 我們肯定不會責備疫苗。

sentences.english: The natural day is very calm, and will hardly reprove his indolence.
sentences.chinese: 時光的天性就是沉靜，它不會因此而責備自己的懶惰。

sentences.english: No one who knew him would tax him with affectation.
sentences.chinese: 真確認識他的人不會責備他矯揉做作。

sentences.english: When we do something wrong, our conscience rebukes us.
sentences.chinese: 我們作錯事的時候，良心會責備我們。

sentences.english: After he bail mei after of reproach know blamed may explain beginning splendor.
sentences.chinese: 玥保釋梅後責備之，後經榮解釋始知錯怪梅。

sentences.english: Do not blame your food ause you have no appetite。
sentences.chinese: 不要因爲你自己沒有胃口而去責備你的食物。

sentences.english: She shot an admonitory glance at her son .
sentences.chinese: 她向兒子投去責備的目光。

sentences.english: I don't like people who are too critical about everything.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有喜愛對於每件事都太求全責備的人。

sentences.english: They blamed him for the accident.
He will blame you for carelessness.
sentences.chinese: 他會責備你的粗枝大葉。

definition: to criticize/to find fault with/to denounce
to err/to make a mistake/to do the wrong thing
to understand/to pay attention to/to take notice of
as it should be by rights (idiom); proper and to be expected as a matter of course/inevitable and right
to gesticulate/to point out/to point the finger of blame
to hurl abuse/to deride/to call sb names
to reckon/to calculate/to plan/to expect/to scheme
to yield/to adapt to/to accommodate to (sth)
